1{-# LANGUAGE ScopedTypeVariables #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Content operators on lists.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Cop.List
7  ( copsList
8    -- $Operators
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Data.List                         as List
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture          as O
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base              as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type              as T
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data              as D
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Coxhand       as H
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Cop.Replace       as Cop
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message  as Msg
19
20
21
22-- ----------------------
23-- $Operators
24--
25--  [@list@]       Construct list.
26--
27--  [@total@]      Calculate total amount of elements in list,
28--                 i.e., summation.
29--
30--  [@length@]     Number of elements.
31--
32--  [@min@]        Minimal element.
33--
34--  [@max@]        Maximal element.
35--
36--  [@++@]         Append lists.
37--
38--  [@intersect@]  Common elements.
39--
40--  [@minus@]      Remove elements.
41--
42
43-- | Content operators on lists.
44copsList :: (D.CContent c) => [D.Cop c]
45copsList =
46    [ D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix "++")              copAppend
47    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix "in")              copFunIn
48    , D.CopCalc  (D.copInfix "intersect")       copIntersect
49
50    , D.CopCox   (D.copPrefix "in")             copCoxIn
51
52    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "++")             copAppend
53    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "drop")           copDrop
54    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "drop-tail")      copDropTail
55    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "drop-take")      copDropTake
56    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "drop-take-tail") copDropTakeTail
57    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "intersect")      copIntersect
58    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "length")         copLength
59    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "list")           copList
60    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "max")            copMax
61    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "min")            copMin
62    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "minus")          copMinus
63    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "push")           copPush
64    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "push-tail")      copPushTail
65    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "replace-all")    copReplaceAll
66    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "replace-begin")  copReplaceBegin
67    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "replace-end")    copReplaceEnd
68    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "replace-first")  copReplaceFirst
69    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "replace-last")   copReplaceLast
70    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "reverse")        copReverse
71    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "sort")           copSort
72    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "take")           copTake
73    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "take-tail")      copTakeTail
74    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "take-odd")     $ copTakeOddEven (B.takeOdd,  B.takeOdd)
75    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "take-even")    $ copTakeOddEven (B.takeEven, B.takeEven)
76    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "term-set")       copTermSet
77    , D.CopCalc  (D.copNormal "total")          copTotal
78    ]
79
80copList :: (D.CList c) => D.CopCalc c
81copList argC = do arg <- sequence argC
82                  D.putList arg
83
84
85-- ----------------------  aggregation
86
87copTotal :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
88copTotal = op where
89    op [Right c] | D.isList c = D.putDec =<< T.decimalSum (map D.gDec $ D.gList c)
90    op xs = Msg.badArg xs
91
92copMin :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
93copMin = op where
94    op [Right c] | D.isList c = Right $ D.minContents $ D.gList c
95    op xs = Msg.badArg xs
96
97copMax :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
98copMax = op where
99    op [Right c] | D.isList c = Right $ D.maxContents $ D.gList c
100    op xs = Msg.badArg xs
101
102-- >>> copLength [D.putText "abc"] :: B.Ab D.Content
103-- Right (ContentDec Decimal (0) 3)
104copLength :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
105copLength = op where
106    op [Right c] | D.isList c  = len c D.gList
107                 | D.isSet  c  = len c D.gSet
108                 | D.isText c  = len c D.gText
109                 | D.isRel  c  = len c (T.relBody . D.gRel)
110    op xs = Msg.badArg xs
111
112    len c f = Right . D.pInt $ length (f c)
113
114
115-- ----------------------  set-like operation
116
117copAppend :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
118copAppend [] = Right D.empty
119copAppend xs@(x : _) = op x where
120    op (Right c) | D.isText c = D.putText . concat =<< mapM D.getText xs
121                 | D.isSet  c = D.putSet  . concat =<< mapM D.getSet  xs
122                 | D.isList c = D.putList . concat =<< mapM D.getList xs
123    op _ = Msg.badArg xs
124
125copIntersect :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
126copIntersect [] = Right D.empty
127copIntersect xs@(x : _) = op x where
128    op (Right c) | D.isSet  c = D.putSet  . intersectLists =<< mapM D.getSet  xs
129                 | D.isList c = D.putList . intersectLists =<< mapM D.getList xs
130    op _ = Msg.badArg xs
131
132copMinus :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
133copMinus = op where
134    op [Right a,  Right b]
135        | D.isSet  a && D.isSet  b = D.putSet  (D.gSet  a List.\\ D.gSet  b)
136        | D.isList a && D.isList b = D.putList (D.gList a List.\\ D.gList b)
137    op xs = Msg.badArg xs
138
139intersectLists :: (Eq a) => [[a]] -> [a]
140intersectLists [] = []
141intersectLists [a] = a
142intersectLists (a : b : xs) = intersectLists $ List.intersect a b : xs
143
144
145-- ----------------------  arrangement
146
147copSort :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
148copSort = op where
149    op [Right c] | D.isList c  = D.putList $ B.sort $ D.gList c
150                 | D.isSet  c  = D.putSet  $ B.sort $ D.gSet  c
151                 | otherwise   = Right c
152    op xs = Msg.badArg xs
153
154copReverse :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
155copReverse = op where
156    op [Right c] | D.isText c  = D.putText $ reverse $ D.gText c
157                 | D.isList c  = D.putList $ reverse $ D.gList c
158    op xs = Msg.badArg xs
159
160
161-- ----------------------  take-odd & take-even
162
163copTakeOddEven :: (D.CContent c) => (String -> String, [c] -> [c]) -> D.CopCalc c
164copTakeOddEven fg arg = D.getRightArg1 arg >>= collMap fg
165
166collMap :: (D.CContent c) => (String -> String, [c] -> [c]) -> c -> B.Ab c
167collMap (f, g) xs
168    | D.isText  xs  = gpMap D.gpText    f xs
169    | D.isList  xs  = gpMap D.gpList    g xs
170    | D.isSet   xs  = gpMap D.gpSetSort g xs
171    | D.isEmpty xs  = Right D.empty
172    | otherwise     = Msg.badArg [Right xs]
173
174gpMap :: D.CGetPut [a] c -> O.Map [a] -> c -> B.Ab c
175gpMap (get, put) f = Right . put . f . get
176
177
178-- ----------------------  take & drop
179
180type TakeDrop a   = Int -> [a] -> [a]
181type TakeDrop2 a  = (TakeDrop Char, TakeDrop a)
182
183copTake :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
184copTake = copTakeOrDrop (take, take)
185
186copDrop :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
187copDrop = copTakeOrDrop (drop, drop)
188
189copTakeTail :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
190copTakeTail = copTakeOrDrop (takeTail, takeTail)
191
192copDropTail :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
193copDropTail = copTakeOrDrop (dropTail, dropTail)
194
195takeTail :: Int -> [a] -> [a]
196takeTail n = (take n O./$/)
197
198dropTail :: Int -> [a] -> [a]
199dropTail n = (drop n O./$/)
200
201copTakeOrDrop :: (D.CContent c) => TakeDrop2 c -> D.CopCalc c
202copTakeOrDrop (f, g) arg =
203    do (n', xs') <- D.getRightArg2 arg
204       if D.isDec n'
205          then collMap (f $ int n', g $ int n') xs'
206          else Msg.badArg arg
207    where
208      int = fromInteger . T.decimalNum . D.gDec
209
210
211-- ----------------------  drop-take
212
213type DropTake a   = Int -> Int -> [a] -> [a]
214type DropTake2 a  = (DropTake Char, DropTake a)
215
216copDropTake :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
217copDropTake = dropTakeCop (dropTake, dropTake)
218
219copDropTakeTail :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
220copDropTakeTail = dropTakeCop (dropTake', dropTake') where
221    dropTake' d t = (dropTake d t O./$/)
222
223dropTake :: DropTake a
224dropTake d t = take t . drop d
225
226dropTakeCop :: (D.CContent c) => DropTake2 c -> D.CopCalc c
227dropTakeCop fg arg =
228    do (d', t', xs') <- D.getRightArg3 arg
229       if D.isDec d' && D.isDec t'
230          then dropTakeDispatch fg arg (int d') (int t') xs'
231          else Msg.badArg arg
232    where
233      int = fromInteger . T.decimalNum . D.gDec
234
235dropTakeDispatch :: (D.CContent c) => DropTake2 c -> [B.Ab c] -> Int -> Int -> c -> B.Ab c
236dropTakeDispatch (f, g) arg d t xs'
237    | D.isText  xs'  = gpMap D.gpText    (f d t) xs'
238    | D.isList  xs'  = gpMap D.gpList    (g d t) xs'
239    | D.isSet   xs'  = gpMap D.gpSetSort (g d t) xs'
240    | D.isEmpty xs'  = Right D.empty
241    | otherwise      = Msg.badArg arg
242
243
244-- ----------------------  push
245
246copPush :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
247copPush = push (:) O.#. D.getRightArg2
248
249copPushTail :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
250copPushTail = push f O.#. D.getRightArg2 where
251    f c = ((c :) O./$/)
252
253push :: (D.CContent c) => (c -> [c] -> [c]) -> (c, c) -> B.Ab c
254push f (c, cs)
255    | D.isList cs = D.putList $ c `f` D.gList cs
256    | D.isSet  cs = D.putSet  $ c `f` D.gSet  cs
257    | otherwise   = Msg.reqCollection
258
259
260-- --------------------------------------------  in
261
262-- syntax
263copCoxIn :: D.CopCox c
264copCoxIn [xs]    = Right $ H.f1 $ H.bin "in" H.b1 xs
265copCoxIn [x, xs] = Right $ H.f1 $ H.bin "in" x    xs
266copCoxIn _       = Msg.adlib "require operand"
267
268-- function
269copFunIn :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
270copFunIn = f O.#. D.getRightArg2 where
271    f (c, cs)
272        | D.isSet  cs  = D.putBool $ c `elem` D.gSet  cs
273        | D.isList cs  = D.putBool $ c `elem` D.gList cs
274        | otherwise    = Msg.reqCollection
275
276
277-- ----------------------  replace
278
279copReplaceAll :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
280copReplaceAll = copReplace Cop.replaceAll
281
282copReplaceFirst :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
283copReplaceFirst = copReplace Cop.replaceFirst
284
285copReplaceLast :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
286copReplaceLast = copReplace Cop.replaceLast
287
288copReplaceBegin :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
289copReplaceBegin = copReplace Cop.replaceBegin
290
291copReplaceEnd :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
292copReplaceEnd = copReplace Cop.replaceEnd
293
294copReplace :: (D.CContent c) => Cop.Replace Char -> D.CopCalc c
295copReplace rep = op where
296    op [Right from, Right to, Right text]
297        | D.isText from && D.isText to && D.isText text =
298            Right $ D.contentApText (D.gText from `rep` D.gText to) text
299    op xs = Msg.badArg xs
300
301
302-- ----------------------  term-set
303
304-- term-set {| aaa /x bbb /y ccc |} => { '/x | '/y }
305copTermSet :: (D.CContent c) => D.CopCalc c
306copTermSet [Right c] | D.isInterp c = D.putSet ts where
307                     ts = map D.pTerm $ T.interpTerms $ D.gInterp c
308copTermSet xs = Msg.badArg xs
309
